---
title: "Home"
---

Hello, respondent!

You have been directed to this website because you participated in a survey which addresses your attitudes and perceptions of coasts, whether they're changing, and how they're managed.  We are so grateful for your participation because your insights and response to this survey were essential for our study's success.

This website compiles survey results among the many responses we received from people like you.  Our goal is to communicate results directly to you so that you have access to the story you have helped us to tell.

At the top of the page you will see tabs which contain overarching results as well as more localized results to explore variation in different places.

Happy perusing!
